abstract: Eugenio Figueredo, former head of Conmebol, organization overseeing South American soccer, is jailed in Uruguay to answer charges in FIFA corruption scandal following his extradition from Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Eugenio Figueredo, a former president of Conmebol, which oversees soccer in South America, was jailed pending trial in his native Uruguay after being extradited from Switzerland to answer charges in the FIFA corruption scandal.
snippet: Eugenio Figueredo, a former president of Conmebol, which oversees soccer in South America, was jailed pending trial in his native Uruguay after being extradited from Switzerland to answer charges in the FIFA corruption scandal.
